queries.query: select regraConditional from RegraConditionalEntity regraConditional join fetch regraConditional.regraConditionalOperations regraConditionalOperations join fetch regraConditional.arquivoInputSheet arquivoInputSheet join fetch arquivoInputSheet.arquivoInput arquivoInput where arquivoInput.id = :arquivoInputId order by regraConditional.ordem

select regraConditional from RegraConditionalEntity regraConditional join fetch regraConditional.regraConditionalOperations regraConditionalOperations join fetch regraConditional.arquivoInputSheet arquivoInputSheet where arquivoInputSheet.id = :arquivoInputSheetId order by regraConditional.ordem
